name: Freestyle Marketing Group
description:
In 2000, the world didn't need another advertising agency. It needed smarter, more strategic thinking to engage customers, and then turning that engagement into sales.
At Freestyle, that has been our goal since opening our doors, and our clients will happily tell you that it's working. Our principals have the experience and skill sets in advertising, interactive, design and media strategy that offer solutions that work across the ever-increasing communications spectrum.
